channel.title: Twitter / toxi
channel.description: Twitter updates from Karsten Schmidt / toxi.

item.title: toxi: @pamela_dust I <3 SIAD and missing the CNC lab too, how about next semester? ;)

item.title: toxi: @KR3M8 i can't see why not? what's your project about? and always remember: credit where it's due... *wink* #socialcollider

item.title: toxi: @JGL i've always preferred this version with 1 multiply less: value = oldValue + (newValue-oldValue)*0.3f (is faster)
item.description: toxi: @JGL i've always preferred this version with 1 multiply less: value = oldValue + (newValue-oldValue)*0.3f (is faster)

item.title: toxi: @mikesten yep, that was quite surprising & funny! :) good to meet you!
item.description: toxi: @mikesten yep, that was quite surprising & funny! :) good to meet you!

item.title: toxi: btw. using JAXB to translate bitmaps w/ marker pixels into XML config files then straight into code/class hierarchy in main app. awesome!
item.description: toxi: btw. using JAXB to translate bitmaps w/ marker pixels into XML config files then straight into code/class hierarchy in main app. awesome!

item.title: toxi: it's been a while, but in love with #JAXB (again). pure elegance! https://jaxb.dev.java.net/

item.title: toxi: 2h of chasing bug in fidgen.googlecode.com. turns out java6 has changed behaviour of ArrayList.remove()... my class needs an equals() now
item.description: toxi: 2h of chasing bug in fidgen.googlecode.com. turns out java6 has changed behaviour of ArrayList.remove()... my class needs an equals() now
